What I Do

My name is Khoi Nguyen, a passionate Vietnam & Canada based web application developer. I first discovered my interest in programming when I was in my mid-20s and I have been working towards improving my own skills, getting into industry and furthering my experience ever since. I specialize in developing website and mobile application.

React JS Core Library

React is my daily comfortable JavaScript framework/library to build powerful and organized front-end applications. React might be less opinionated than other frameworks that allows me to do the same thing in many ways which I love to.

View Projects

NodeJS Development

Node.js is the main server-side language that I use to build from simple to scalable apps. Integrating with Express.js as a back-end framework, MongoDB as a NoSQL database and LoopBack as a Node.js API Framework allowing me to create dynamic REST API with less coding.

View Projects

Angular Framework

Angular is the secondary JavaScript framework that I have used to build some of my projects. Personally, I think Angular is more opinionated than React that makes it easier to follow and gives more clearer instruction to what I am supposed to do.

View Projects

Version Control

I ultilize Git as version control to work with GitHub repositories and modern website hosting services as GitHub Pages and Heroku.

View GitHub

Laravel + VueJS

I also pay attention to Laravel, which is the legacy PHP framework with decently new JS framework as Vue.js and working on some projects.

View Projects

CSS Frameworks

Bootstrap is my main CSS framework to develop front-end UI. Moreover, I have also used Materialze CSS for building some simple and minimalistic UI apps.

View Projects
